app.name: Budget App
app.description: App for managing personal finances and checking per-day available budget.

budgetDevelopment.headline: Budget development

available.label: Actually available
available.tooltip: You could now spend up to {n} and still have enough money left over to pay all your upcoming expenses without overdrawing your accounts.

budgetDevelopment.empty: Please add more repeated transactions to see the budget development here.

confirmDelete.description: Are you sure that you want to delete the selected data? This action can not be reverted.

overdue.headline: Overdue transactions
overdue.description: You have one overdue transaction. | You have {n} overdue transactions.

modal.description: You can check all your overdue transactions here and automatically update the booking date accordingly.

endDate.label: Repeat until
endDate.info: Is selected, the transaction will only be repeated until (including) the given end date. Otherwise, it will be repeated unlimited.

gettingStarted.headline: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: To start using this budget app, you need to login to create an account where all your entered data is connected to. It also allows you to login on multiple devices. Currently, login is only possible using an GitHub.
